title: Developer Journal
description: A developer-focused journal app with task tracking and progress visualization.
fullDescription: Co-led a team of 12 in an Agile environment to develop a developer journal application enabling task tracking, progress visualization, and project organization for developers. Managed task assignments, repository updates, and code reviews. Wrote user stories, ADRs, CI/CD materials, and E2E tests; filmed/edited project videos and co-presented the final pitch.
technologies: Electron and Other Dependencies|HTML, CSS, JavaScript|Git/Github
responsibilities: Planned/wrote team contract|Filmed demo videos, team videos, etc.|Edited and uploaded all videos|Wrote SWOT analysis|Assigned tasks/roles to team|Reviewed & approved pull requests|Helped write pitch document|Presented pitch|Contributed to brainstorm boards|Updated GitHub repository|Attended/helped run all meetings|Wrote ADR's for project decisions|Wrote cicd markdown page|Wrote user stories|Planned/wrote E2E tests for dashboard & password page|Reviewed/revised code and assisted with debugging
